subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When the Buffalo Sabres introduced their new logo last June, the reaction from fans was overwhelmingly negative. But after their 10-0 start in October, Sabres merchandise began flying off the shelves.
snippet: When the Buffalo Sabres introduced their new logo last June, the reaction from fans was overwhelmingly negative. But after their 10-0 start in October, Sabres merchandise began flying off the shelves.
